transcript.text: [Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x 22

1165 a and today's day to December 29th

collapse financial news now here we are
on December 29th we have one more

market down a little bit once again
pretty much staying even and we will
have to see what happens tomorrow will

administration all of a sudden push the

Year's that's what we're watching I mean
they might do it they might not do it
but we could see right now whatever
they're doing whatever lies they're
pushing it is to create the illusion
that the economy is doing well and
they're going to do this up until the
very end I mean we see that Trump he
announced that sprint will be bringing

gesture it's keeping the jobs here don't
know what the specifics are on why all
of a sudden jobs are going to come back
because what has changed we don't know
yet but we can see right now this is
still not enough it sounds good on the

saying it it sounds good for those
people who aren't going to lose their
jobs those jobs will come back here to

they're still in control of what's going
on the country is still in debt 20
trillion if you go by the US government
numbers if you go with the unmanned ated

out that it's really around
211 trillion dollars but once again we
always need to remember that the central
bankers they're in control they're
steering the ship yes the president can

main things that they the president
needs to do is they need to get rid of
the central bank and take control of the
entire system the creation of currency
the control back to the people and
without doing that this whole plan is
not going to work because what we'll end
up with is the same exact thing we see
that gold is up for five days in a row
and is surging above 1150 today well if
someone decided to buy about 3.5 billion
notional paper contracts a precious
metal and they did this into the
European clothes which brought gold up
maybe someone is out there looking at

coming to an end we see US auto sales
cars and trucks well it seems that with

that buyers are saying you know maybe
I'll hold off right now and the optimism
of purchasing all of these things well
it's evaporating right now with interest

people say well you know what let me
wait and if it
moves up again they say okay I'm
completely out now when we're looking at

luxury real estate broker olshan realty
well they have some bad news for New

because what we're seeing right now is
that contracts for luxury coops they've

while the average number of days that
the apartments set on the market surged
by thirty one percent and what does this
tell us well it tells us that these
bubbles are starting to burst they're
going to come down and we're seeing

going to get worse and worse and worse
and if you notice and if you go back a
year when we talked about how prices

couldn't see it it was a little
noticeable but as we went through 2016
we saw signs of it we saw interest rates

they're starting to fall apart and now
you're really starting to see it and
when we move into 2017 it's going to be
widespread you won't be able to deny it

we see out in Italy things are a lot

telling the Italian banks that they owe
a lot more than just the five billion
they owe 8.8 billion in euros because
what they're seeing they're seeing a
bank run and it's accelerating deposits

reason for this is because people in

and we see right now that most likely
very high probability that they're going
to do bail-ins in italy you're going to
see balance in Germany you're going to

Europe because what do they have left
not much so as we come to the close of

they have set up the economy to

recovered and the statistical

maybe the economy is doing a lot better
look at the stock market it's

it's skyrocketing and we see right now
that they have completely set this up so

well we don't know as of yet many people

the dollar is going to be worth nothing
it's going to be a piece of paper with
ink and that is it and as we move away

done with they know it they set it up
they knew that this time would come and
here we are right now and

now it would be nice if we could do the

they don't want to give up anything they
just can't they just want to get rid of
